template.name: respond_to
def as_json
ajson
template.value: json.data do json.array! @$model$s, partial: 'member/posts/$model$', as: :$model$ end

template.name: search
template.value: if (current_user) Post.current_user= = current_user Comment.current_user= = current_user end if params[:search_words] User.reindex @$model$s = User.search(params[:search_words], page: params[:page], per_page: 20) else @$model$s = User.includes(:member_info_basic).all.paginate :page => params[:page] end

template.name: search_and_tag
template.value: if (current_user) Post.current_user = current_user Comment.current_use = current_user end @$posts$ = $Post$.includes(:post_attachment_images, :user).order(updated_at: :desc).all.paginate :page => params[:page] if params[:tag] @$posts$ = $Post$.tagged_with(params[:tag]).order(updated_at: :desc).all.paginate :page => params[:page] elsif params[:app] @$posts$ = $Post$.tagged_with(params[:app]).order(updated_at: :desc).all.paginate :page => params[:page] elsif params[:search_words] $Post$.reindex @$posts$ = $Post$.search(params[:search_words], page: params[:page], per_page: 20) else @$posts$ = $Post$.includes(:post_attachment_images, :user).order(updated_at: :desc).all.paginate :page => params[:page] end

template.name: form_for
template.value:
<%= form_for(@$user$) do |f| %> <% if @$user$.errors.any? %>

<%= pluralize(@$user$.errors.count, "error") %> prohibited this user from being saved:

    <% @$user$.errors.full_messages.each do |message| %>
  • <%= message %>
    • <% end %>
<% end %>
<%= f.text_field :name, placeholder: "用户名", class: 'form-control' %>
<%= f.email_field :email, placeholder: '邮箱', class: 'form-control' %>
<%= f.password_field :password, placeholder: '密码', class: 'form-control' %>
<%= f.password_field :password_confirmation, placeholder: '确认密码', class: 'form-control' %>
<%= f.submit "注册账号", class: "btn btn-primary" %> <% end %>

template.name: jbuilder_show
template.value: json.merge! @$model$.attributes.as_json json.$model$_comments_count @$model$.$model$_comments_count json.$model$_upvotes @$model$.$model$_upvotes json.$model$_downvotes @$model$.$model$_downvotes json.$model$_upvoted? @$model$.$model$_upvoted? json.$model$_downvoted? @$model$.$model$_downvoted? json.cover @$model$.cover.url json.user do json.image @$model$.user.member_info_basic.image.url json.name @$model$.user.member_info_basic.name if @$model$.user.member_info_basic end json.$model$_comments do json.array! @$model$.$model$_comments do |comment| json.comment comment json.comment_upvotes comment.comment_upvotes json.comment_downvotes comment.comment_downvotes json.comment_upvoted? comment.comment_upvoted? json.comment_downvoted? comment.comment_downvoted? json.user do json.name comment.user.member_info_basic ? comment.user.member_info_basic.name : "无名" json.image comment.user.member_info_basic ? comment.user.member_info_basic.image.url : "http://ociweb.oss-cn-hangzhou.aliyuncs.com/uploads/my_file/name/pp.png" end end end

template.name: json.current_page
template.value: json.current_page @$model_name$s.current_page json.per_page @$model_name$s.per_page json.total_entries @$model_name$s.total_entries json.$model_name$s do json.array! @$model_name$s, partial: 'shared/$model_name$', as: :$model_name$ end

template.name: flash-message
template.value:
<% flash.each do |message_type, message| %>
<%= message %>
<% end %>

template.name: get_loading_time
template.value:
before_action :set_start_time
def set_start_time @start_time = Time.now.to_f end Page Rendered in <%= sprintf('%.3f', (Time.now.to_f - @start_time) ) %> seconds

template.name: skip_before_action_token
template.value:
skip_before_action :verify_authenticity_token, if: :json_request?
protected def json_request? request.format.json? end
